sentences.cn: “ 问题就在这里, 牧师, ” 比尔回答说.

sentences.en: Our vicar is always raising money for one cause or another, but he has never managed to get enough money to have the church clock repaired.
sentences.cn: 我们的牧师老是为这事或那事筹募款项, 但是从来也没能募集到足够把教堂大钟修复起来的钱.

sentences.en: Our vicar is always raising money for one cause or another.
sentences.cn: 我们的牧师老是在为这桩或那桩事募款.

sentences.en: She always puts on a posh voice to talk to the vicar.
sentences.cn: 她总是装腔作势,用一种优雅的嗓音跟教区牧师讲话.

sentences.en: The housekeeper moved smartly to the Vicar's desk to answer the call.
sentences.cn: 管家迅速来到牧师的书桌前接电话。

sentences.en: The local vicar has agreed to marry us in the chapel on the estate.
sentences.cn: 当地的牧师已经同意在庄园的小教堂里为我们主持婚礼。

sentences.en: The new vicar's a Marxist that'll set the cat among the pigeons!
sentences.cn: 新来的牧师是马克思主义者 -- 这下子可要鸡犬不宁了.

sentences.en: The parish has welcomed the new vicar with open arms.
sentences.cn: 教区居民双手欢迎新来的牧师.
牧师觉得自己叫人挤到墙角里去了.

sentences.en: The vicar has been asked to have the tree cut down.
sentences.cn: 有人请求牧师叫人把树砍倒.

sentences.en: The vicar preached to the congregation for half an hour.
sentences.cn: 那位教区牧师向会众讲道半个小时.

sentences.en: The vicar took a candlestick from the altar.
sentences.cn: 牧师从圣餐台上拿起一座烛台.

sentences.en: They had evidently been paying a visit to the vicar.
sentences.cn: 他们分明是刚拜访教区长来着.

sentences.en: We were married by our local vicar.
sentences.cn: 我们是由本地教区牧师主持婚礼的.

sentences.en: With this, the vicar rode on his way.
sentences.cn: 说着, 那牧师便策马上路了.

sentences.en: Worry less about how you make the money, and more about where the vicar invests your profits.
sentences.cn: 少担心点你是如何挣的钱，多考虑一下教区牧师把你的利润投到了哪里。

words.tran_cn: 代理的；教区牧师的；代理教区牧师职务的
替代的；代理的；发同感的
代理地，担任代理者地；间接感受到地
教区牧师，教堂牧师；传教牧师；代理人

trans.tran_cn: （英国国教的）教区牧师，（天主教的）主教代理，教皇，代理人
trans.tran_en: a priest in the Church of England who is in charge of a church in a particular area
